meanings.sent1: The vines in the jungle were the ropiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The old sailor showed us how to tie the ropiest knots.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a ropiest scarf out of his hat, much to the audience's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was so tangled, it looked like the ropiest mess imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The cowboy's lasso was the ropiest one in the whole rodeo.

meanings.definition: Of poor quality or condition; weak or sickly.
meanings.sent1: The soup tasted like the ropiest broth I had ever tried.
meanings.sent2: The fabric of the old shirt felt the ropiest against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The ropiest excuse for being late was blaming it on a herd of turtles crossing the road.
meanings.sent4: The team's performance was the ropiest they had ever displayed, much to the coach's disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the dumpster was the ropiest stench imaginable.
